channel.title: Tidyverse on Cameron's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tidyverse on Cameron's blog

item.title: tidyverse: readr
item.description: Loading data can be the most innocuous and frustrating challenge when starting a data science project. Missing values, trailing commas, superfluous quotes in strings and many other issues can all cause headaches when trying to read a csv file. This post assumes that you’ve managed to get your data into a reasonable format. The above points are a good place to start if you are having issues. If you can’t work out why your data won’t load always try viewing it in a text editor such as Notepad++ or Atom.
